mapper.select: SELECT JAN.EMAIL , JAN.NICKNAME , JAN.CAREER , JAN.INTRO , JAN.PROFILE_PATH FROM JANDI_TBL JAN WHERE JAN.EMAIL = #{ email }

SELECT V.CLASS_CODE , V.CREATE_DATE , V.TAG , V.TITLE , V.PRICE , V.FILE_PATH , V.VIEWS , V.PROFILE_PATH , V.NICKNAME , V.CATEGORY_NAME , V.AVGSTAR , V.RVCOUNT , ROWNUM FROM (SELECT A.CLASS_CODE , A.CREATE_DATE , A.TAG , A.TITLE , A.PRICE , A.FILE_PATH , A.VIEWS , B.PROFILE_PATH , B.NICKNAME , C.CATEGORY_NAME , NVL(AVG(D.STAR), 0) AVGSTAR , COUNT(D.REVIEW_CODE) RVCOUNT FROM CLASS_TBL A JOIN JANDI_TBL B ON (A.EMAIL = B.EMAIL) JOIN CATEGORY_TBL C ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) LEFT JOIN CLASS_REVIEW_TBL D ON (A.CLASS_CODE = D.CLASS_CODE) WHERE A.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND A.EMAIL = #{ email } GROUP BY A.CLASS_CODE , A.CREATE_DATE , A.TAG , A.TITLE , A.PRICE , A.VIEWS , A.FILE_PATH , B.PROFILE_PATH , B.NICKNAME , C.CATEGORY_NAME ORDER BY A.VIEWS DESC )V WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
